channel.title: Help help help client uploading , people cant play to the client! help help!
channel.description:
i tryed all the way is possible ... when the person downlooad the client with the cache.. the run.bat dont working. ( like if files was missing ) then when they try to compile its said 100 error alot of files missing.. why???
i packed all the files of client and hided it .. do i ahev to put the server files tpoo and hide it too? plz someone im ready to pay 10$ to the first gujy who will be able to fix that
plz private message me if ur interested. and if ur sure that ur a good coder.
( i heard that i had a prob with cache but.. im not sure.. ) btw iim using source: vernix-pkz base: insidiaX
thanks in advance! ( SORRY FOR BAD ENGLISH IM FRENCH )
